title: **Stimulation with Cytokines and preparation of whole cell extracts**

body.body: Grow cells as indicated above upto 80% confluent.
Replace medium with starvation medium \(1% BSA) and starve for 2 h
Stimulate starved cells with cytokines or growth factors as described avove.
After stimulation, rinse cells with ice-cold PBS.
Following steps should be done on ice or at 4 °C using ice cold buffers.
Add 0.6 ml of lysis buffer \(with freshly added inhibitors) to a 100 mm cell culture plate.
Scrape plate with a cell scraper.
Using 2 ml pipette or syringe fitted with 21 gauge needle, transfer lysate to chilled microcentrifuge tube.
Wash the plate once with 0.3 ml of lysis buffer and combine with first lysate.
Pass through the 21 gauge needle to shear the DNA.
Add fresh 10 µl stock PMSF \(10 mg/ml) and incubate on ice for 30 minutes.
Microcentrifuge cell lysate \(Max speed in microfuge) for 30 minutes at 4° C.
Collect supernatant in a fresh tube
Centrifuge supernatant again for 10 minutes. The supernatant fluid is the total cell lysate.
Aliquot sample for freeze at -70°C
Quantitate protein extract by photometry
Use approximately 20-50 μg of purified protein, nuclear or whole cell extract
Mix with 4X Nupage sample buffer \(i.e make it 1X with respect to buffer).
Denature proteins \(10 min at 70 degrees) in loading buffer with reducing reagent and vortex to mix
Wash wells and load 10-20μl of sample.
Run at 200 V until the first blue band is at the bottom \(35-50 min).
Semi-Dry Transfer Using Immobilin-P Membrane
Soak gel in transfer buffer for 15 minutes \(with 3 buffer changes).
Wet membrane in 100% methanol for 15 seconds
Wet membrane in H<sub>2</sub>O for 2 minutes
Wet membrane in transfer buffer for at least 5 minutes
Wet two sheet of thick filter paper in transfer buffer
Place on semi-dry blotter.
place the treated membrane on top of buffered filter papers
place the gel on top of the membrane
Wet two thick filter papers in transfer buffer and place on top of the gel
Run at 16-20 V \(200 mAmp), for approx. 30 min. Don’t exceed 25 V
Rinse membrane in water \(2X)
Incubate 1 hr with 5% MLK/0.05% Tween 20/PBS \(MTB) without Mg/Ca++ at RT
Incubate with primary Ab in MTB \(0.1-1 μg per ml) at 4 °C overnight
Rinse in water \(2X)
Incubate with anti-rabbit or anti-mouse HRP \(1: 10,000-25,000 dilution) at RT for 1 hour
Rinse with PBS+0.05% Tween 20 twice and wash for 10 min at RT \(3 times).
Remove detection reagents and allow to equilibrate at room temperature before opening
Mix detection solutions A and solution B in a ratio of 40:1\(Total volume 0.1ml/cm<sup>2</sup>)
Pipette detection solution on the membrane and incubate for 5 min at room temperature.
Place on Saran Wrap
Autoradiograph.
